question: Over what production span was the four-door saloon variant of a compact Swedish estate car manufactured?
llm_answer: The four-door saloon variant of the compact Swedish estate car (Volvo S40) was manufactured from 1995 to 2012.

scores.explanation: The Model Answer correctly identifies the production span of the four-door saloon variant (Volvo S40) as 1995 to 2012, which matches the Gold Answer and is supported by the Retrieved Context. It includes all relevant facts without introducing unsupported details.
